title: After 20:00 lag + droping every 2-3 mins..
body: Why east server these days after 20:00 make hard drops... i have internet .. but game drop me... and say dont have internet... i reconnect after 3-4 mins again... this is from last couple of days... game was unplayable ?! riot whats going on?

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing a *poor connection* to our servers. This is normally caused by specific network settings that conflict with League or issues along your ISP routing to the server. I'd like you to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first, to ensure that your local settings are fine before we investigate further.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
